Articles.Content:
Banned for assuming that things cannot create themselves. We already threw away proper logic when the first KSP player ever added a second booster.

Hey, a new page!

Edited February 20, 2022 by SkyFall2489
The new page is created not on this page, but on the prior page banning.

Banned.  If you do want logic, consider that both posts played equal parts in the creation of the new page, as did every one of the posts before it. Every post before has led up to this point, ever since @mnnm1234 created this thread 9.5 years ago.
Banned for pointing out that the creator only lasted a year and three months but that their game keeps going.
Banned for implying that is a bad thing. mnnm1234's legacy lives on, even after they have left the forums for years.
Banned for implying that I was implying. I had just banned you for pointing it out.

Banned for not implying that you were not implying, implying that you were implying.

wait what?
Banned for supplying that you were implying that you were relying on the implication of the simplification of inflation to understand the reason your banned that got out of hand.

Banned for implying that I was supplying the information that i was implying on a ban based on a complex chain of implications; I was not even implying. 

By the way, given that there are 25 posts per full page, this is the 27559th ban.

In only 5 of those posts, the implications got out of hand.. I believe this implies it will continue for a while, becoming exponentially more confusing as it does so.

Some day, the implications will outnumber the ants and roaches, and take over the world.

Edited February 21, 2022 by SkyFall2489
Banned for the implications of arbitrary circumstances.

Banned for implying that i was implying these circumstances were arbitrary - Earth will likely end in fire, either from the sun or nuclear war - and the insects will survive a while, but the implications will survive longer.
Banned for making the insects live on the burnt land.
I've got agree with Kerbiloid on that one.
Banned for agreeing.
Banned for disagreeing
Banned for copying.
Banned for murdering my tongue.
Banned for not avoiding a murder.

Banned for mordoring.

(Ninja'd)

The next one is banned for voiding Mordor.
Banned for banning me.
Banned for mirror(r)ing.
Banned for (r)ing.
Banned for (g)
Baned for spel correctly.
Dogged by a cat who is wild.
